Description:
Unsurpassable views from an award winning development
Designed by the highly renowned Jackson Clements Burrows architects, the Abito building is a dual award-winning development. Its characteristics highlight a perfect combination of Fitzroys renowned heritage structures and its association with environmental sustainability. Abitos external contemporary design is a true landmark with exceptional quality and rich colour to match. Perfectly positioned with a convenient commute into the city via nearby trams and you can easily take a stroll to the divine Carlton Gardens. Better yet, be surrounded by arty cafe's and enjoy some of Melbournes best coffee on offer having Brunswick street essentially at your doorstep.
Abitos apartment interior effortlessly matches the exterior with its industrial like designs and finishes. Situated on the 4th floor of the complex, this desirable apartment offers picturesque, uninterrupted, and panoramic views that overlook the city skyline from a very tranquil balcony. It is well equipped with two spacious bedrooms (BIRs), an en-suite and bathroom, study nook, laundry, heating and cooling with secure car park and basement storage cage.
Jackson Clements Burrows were the winners of the 2006 Urban Development Institute of Australias Excellence Award for medium-density development, and in 2007 the RAIA awarded Abito a Victorian Architecture Award for Residential Architecture Multiple Housing.
For your chance to own in this award winning landmark building, inspect now before its too late!
